page.title: 15HEDGEROWS
page.content: We looked at the hedge on Roman Bank. Each person studied a 4 metre section Altogether, we looked at 88m of hedgerow. These are the plants we found growing in the hedge:{blackthorn,blackberry, {wild rose,hawthorn,ivy,bryony,hazel, {silver birch,maple,honey suckle,ash, {sycammore, In each 30 yard stretch of hedge, we found 5 or 6 different shrubs . We think the hedge is 500 to 600 years old. These are the plants we found growing under the hedge :{dandilion,dogs {mercury,cow parsley, jack by the {hedge, nettle, silver weed, hogweed {goosegrass, lords and ladies, {plantain,thistle, wild strawberry, {stitchwort, meadowsweet, yarrow, {cinquefoil, yellow archangel, }
